title: I need your help!! with client not opening!!! please help!!
body: First i bought a 90v charger for a 65v laptop. It prompts that i need a 65v or higher and yet im pushing 90v. anyways when i click on the launch screen my client never opens. Does anyone have any tech. help relavent to this? thanks in advanced!

replies.body:
As far as that laptop charger goes, I'd recommend getting a 65V charger to make sure you won't be overheating that battery!

As for the client not opening, most of the time it's a simple case of missing [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). If League doesn't have admin permissions in place, your OS might block it from running entirely. Check out the steps in that permission guide and let me know how it works!
